create

public static java.lang.String create(java.lang.String templateName,
                                      int nTasks,
                                      java.lang.String resultSetName,
                                      boolean keepRunning)
                               throws com.parabon.rapids.TemplateFormatException,
                                      java.io.IOException,
                                      com.parabon.rapids.BadParameterException
Creates a new Job from a simple Rapids Template.

Parameters:
templateName - name of the template to be used in creating the job
nTasks - number of tasks to create
resultSetName - name of the result set the job will create
keepRunning - if true, the listener will not automatically terminate when the last task completes
Returns:
JobId for the newly created job
Throws:
com.parabon.rapids.TemplateFormatException
java.io.IOException
com.parabon.rapids.BadParameterException

create

public static java.lang.String create(java.lang.String templateName,
                                      java.lang.String dataSetName,
                                      java.lang.String resultSetName,
                                      boolean keepRunning)
                               throws com.parabon.rapids.TemplateFormatException,
                                      java.io.IOException,
                                      com.parabon.rapids.BadParameterException
Creates a new Job from a complex Rapids Template.

Parameters:
templateName - name of the template to be used in creating the job
dataSetName - name of the data set to use in creating the job
resultSetName - name of the result set the job will create
keepRunning - if true, the listener will not automatically terminate when the last task completes
Returns:
JobId for the newly created job
Throws:
com.parabon.rapids.TemplateFormatException
java.io.IOException
com.parabon.rapids.BadParameterException
